description:
BUY OUR NEW SNOWFLAKE DICE SET: https://store.gamersnexus.net/products/snowflake-full-tabletop-mtg-dnd-premium-dice-set-7-piece-dice-wooden-box-cat-card
BUY OUR NEW INDUCTOR DICE SET: https://store.gamersnexus.net/products/inductor-full-tabletop-mtg-dnd-premium-dice-set-7-piece-dice-wooden-box-token-card
We just launched our first-ever tabletop products (and our first-ever Snowflake product): The 'Inductor' dice set, which uses e-waste inductors embedded within sharp-edge resin dice, and the 'Snowflake' dice set, which features a miniature Snowflake the cat within the dice. Each kit includes 7 tabletop gaming dice, a 3-part high-quality wooden dice box, an integrated dice rolling tray, an included playing card (the Inductor set gets a Goblin Creature Token that Andrew & Steve designed; the Snowflake set gets a 'Snowflake, Heedless One' possibly overpowered cat card), and an RNG treasure table. The sets include a D20, D12, D10, D00 (percentile), D8, D6, and D4, for 7 total.

title: GamersNexus Breaks Into Tabletop Gaming
